actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, H. Rept. 95-1123.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 601 of title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide for a continuation of the authority of the Administrator to furnish hospital care to certain veterans living in a State, territory, commonwealth, or possession of the United States not contiguous to the 48 contiguous States.

summary.text: Provides for the continuation of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs authority to furnish private hospital care to certain veterans living in a State, territory, Commonwealth, or possession of the United States not contiguous to the forty-eight contiguous States.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 601 of title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide for a continuation of the authority of the Administrator to furnish hospital care to certain veterans living in a State, territory, commonwealth, or possession of the United States not contiguous to the 48 contiguous States.
